info.label: Programmer
info.brief: I'm fullstack developer, currently seeking a position that challenges me to be a better programmer. I always hungry to learn new things especially with team that apply modern management.

location.address: Jln. Panglima Polim, Gg. Sidodadi No. 24a

history.summary: Build experimental search engine (robot spider and crawler) for a website that has a niche agriculture, using fullstack Javascript. Also help to build follower web service system like twitter using graph database for farmer.
highlights: Build experimental search engine from scratch including spider and scraper
Create search engine dashboard with React + Redux
Create a social graph connection (follower system) webservice using graph database
Help restructure internal REST API web-service

history.summary: Do web scraping from various website using headless browser before it's cool. Use that data to build a website that can be monetize in various way.
highlights: Migrate entire code from PHP source to node.js
Create Piranhax - Amazon Product Advertising API client for Node.js

testimonials.name: Ribhararnus Pracutian (Oknoorap.com)
testimonials.quote: Saya menggeluti programming, dan mengikuti perkembangan science dan dunia developer sebagai hobi, saya pikir saya sudah menguasainya, tetapi saudara kembar saya ternyata lebih maju satu langkah dari saya
